If A is true then B is true
等價於
“A is true” implies “B is true”

A is true if and only if B is true
等價於
“A is true” implies “B is true” and “B is true” implies “A is true”.

Only if B is true, A is true 即係話 唯有當B is true時，A才是true
所以
Only if B is true, A is true
等價於
當A is true時，B只可以係true

有錯請指正

replies.msg:
啱一半
If A then B 即係 A is sufficient for B
A only if B 即係 B is necessary for A
可以理解為if not B then not A
即係if A then B 嘅contrapositive
兩者係tautology, logically equivalent
所以兩個其實係同樣意思唔同表達方法
都係 A -> B

順便解答樓主
所以A if and only if B 即係 A is sufficient and necessary for B
即係話A implies B, B also implies A
not B implies not A, not A implies not B
利申：數學系
